snippet: The rate of suicide in the United States rose sharply during the first few years since the start of the recession, a new analysis has found.
abstract: Report published in journal The Lancet finds rate of suicide in United States rose sharply between 2008 and 2010, first years of recession.
lead_paragraph: The rate of suicide in the United States rose sharply during the first few years since the start of the recession, a new analysis has found.

headline.seo: Suicide Rate Rose During Recession, Study Finds
headline.main: Increase Seen in U.S. Suicide Rate Since Recession
headline.print_headline: Increase Seen In Suicide Rate Since Recession
